name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, oregano, and basil. A simple yet flavorful dish that celebrates freshness, balance, and tradition.

name: Classic Burrata
description: Rich burrata, tomatoes, mozzarella, and parmesan come together for a creamy, luxurious pizza ideal for cheese lovers and flavor seekers.

name: Diavola
description: Spicy pepperoni and salami with mozzarella and tomato sauce deliver a bold, smoky, flavorful experience with an enjoyable spicy kick.

name: Vegetariana
description: A colorful blend of vegetables including artichokes, zucchini, and mushrooms with mozzarella. Fresh, nutritious, and packed with satisfying flavor.

name: Da Calabria
description: Southern Italian inspiration with sausage, mushrooms, and olives. Smoky, savory, and balanced perfectly with rich mozzarella and deep flavor notes.

name: Capricciosa
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, artichokes, olives, and prosciutto come together for a balanced, savory experience ideal for classic pizza fans.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Rich egg-based sauce coats spaghetti with crispy guanciale and pecorino. Traditional Italian dish with creamy texture and deep comforting flavor.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
description: Spicy tomato sauce with garlic and chili coats penne pasta perfectly. Simple, fiery, bold, and deeply satisfying for spice lovers.

name: Tagliatelle Bolognese
description: Homemade tagliatelle with beef rag√π slow-cooked in tomato, carrot, onion, and celery. Hearty and comforting with authentic Italian richness.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Creamy butter and parmesan sauce envelop fettuccine for a luxurious, smooth dish. Rich, elegant, and truly comforting Italian pasta classic.

name: Purple Corn Tostada
description: A vibrant starter with beetroot, ricotta, goat cheese, and datterini. Creamy, earthy, colorful, and ideal for a flavorful beginning.

name: Bruno's Scribble
description: A gourmet mix of cured meats, sliced and aged to perfection. Savory, rich, shareable, and ideal for tasting indulgence together.

name: Fresh Oysters Dozen
description: Twelve oysters served chilled with lime. A fresh seafood delight offering clean, briny flavor with elegance and ocean-inspired sophistication.

name: Brussel Sprouts New
description: Roasted Brussels sprouts with pork lardon and balsamic glaze. Smoky, sweet, crispy, and perfect for fans of bold vegetables.

name: Broccolini & XO Butter
description: Tender broccolini finished with savory XO butter and crispy shallots. A flavorful side with deep umami and great texture.

name: Arancini Balls
description: Golden risotto balls with mozzarella centers and crispy coating. A satisfying bite combining creamy cheese and crunchy perfection together.

name: Beef Carpaccio
description: Raw beef slices topped with arugula, parmesan, and lemon. A refined starter offering freshness, elegance, and authentic Italian essence.

name: Grilled Halloumi
description: Grilled halloumi cheese served warm with fresh herbs and sweet honey. A savory-sweet dish with satisfying texture and delightful flavor.

name: Garlic Parmesan Fries
description: Crispy fries coated in garlic butter and parmesan. Crunchy, flavorful, and a crowd-pleasing side to elevate every savory meal.

name: Sweet Potato Wedges
description: Roasted sweet potatoes with smoky paprika and sea salt, served with aioli. Sweet, spicy, creamy, and perfectly roasted to perfection.
